description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Montrose vs Arbroath in the Scottish League One
title: Montrose vs Arbroath: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Montrose vs Arbroath: Scottish League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Andy Winter (Arbroath) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box.
Post
Paul Watson (Montrose) hits the left post with a left footed shot from outside the box.
